text.section: Within 10 days after the adjustment of a loss from a fire in excess of $5,000 damage sustained by an insurer doing business in the State, the insurer shall report to the State Fire Marshal, on a form provided by the State Fire Marshal, the information that the State Fire Marshal considers necessary.
The report required under subsection (a) of this section is in addition to any information required by the Insurance Commissioner.
